content:
TITLE: Trading Operations with KuCoin Python SDK
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to initialize the Trade client and execute trading operations like creating limit and market orders, and canceling orders.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
# Trade
from kucoin.client import Trade
client = Trade(key='', secret='', passphrase='', url='')



# place a limit buy order
order_id = client.create_limit_order('BTC-USDT', 'buy', '1', '8000')

# place a market buy order   Use cautiously
order_id = client.create_market_order('BTC-USDT', 'buy', size='1')

# cancel limit order 
client.cancel_order('5bd6e9286d99522a52e458de')
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: API Authentication Variables for KuCoin
DESCRIPTION: Declaration of API key, secret, and passphrase variables required for authenticated API requests to KuCoin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
api_key = '<api_key>'
api_secret = '<api_secret>'
api_passphrase = '<api_passphrase>'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: User Account Operations with KuCoin Python SDK
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to initialize the User client with authentication credentials and retrieve withdrawal quota information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
# User
from kucoin.client import User
client = User(api_key, api_secret, api_passphrase)



address = client.get_withdrawal_quota('KCS')
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accessing Market Data with KuCoin Python SDK
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to initialize the Market client and retrieve market data such as klines and server timestamp.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
#  MarketData
from kucoin.client import Market
client = Market(url='https://api.kucoin.com')
# client = Market()



# get symbol kline
klines = client.get_kline('BTC-USDT','1min')

# get symbol ticker
server_time = client.get_server_timestamp()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Python Package Dependencies for KuCoin SDK
DESCRIPTION: Specifies the required Python packages for the KuCoin SDK implementation. Includes requests for REST API interactions and websockets for real-time market data streaming.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/requirements.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
requests
websockets
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing KuCoin Python SDK via pip
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the KuCoin Python SDK package using pip package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/kucoin/kucoin-python-sdk/blob/master/README.rst#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install kucoin-python
```
